reasoning: Umbrella term too heterogeneous to estimate meaningfully. Includes diverse ion channel disorders across multiple organ systems: cardiac (Long QT, Brugada), neurologic (some epilepsies, migraines), pulmonary (cystic fibrosis), muscular (myotonias, periodic paralyses), and renal channelopathies. These have vastly different incidence rates, pathophysiology, and clinical significance. Aggregate estimate not useful.
